p.span:
The Mission of the Branchburg Township School District and Community
is to inspire our children to learn, think, grow and excel in life.

br.span: For updates regarding school closures and Distance Learning please refer to letters from Superintendent Rebecca Gensel.

div.div: I am very pleased to share with you that the nomination process for the 2019-2020 Governor's Educator of the Year program is now open.
div.a: Read More about Nominations Now Open for 2019-2020

div.div: STEM is the acronym for Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math and the integration of those areas into a seamless, meaningful way throughout the different subjects.
div.a: Read More about What is STEM?

p.span:
Dear Branchburg Families and Community Members,
I am pleased to be serving as the Superintendent of the Branchburg Township School District and to be working with you to provide a strong and relevant education to the students of Branchburg.
It is a privilege to serve in a District where the families have an unwavering commitment to the success of our school system. I am confident we will continue to work together in support of dynamic learning environments for our students.

p.strong: Branchburg Township School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, gender, affectional or sexual orientation, ancestry, or social or economic status.

WEBSITE ACCESSIBILITY: Branchburg Township School District is committed to making our content accessible to all members of the community, including those with disabilities. If you need assistance in accessing materials on our websites, please contact us at webmaster@branchburg.k12.nj.us.
